last_episode_to_air.name: Van Brett Watkins: Hitman
last_episode_to_air.overview: On November 15, 1999 the 24-year-old pregnant girlfriend of Carolina Panthers football player Rae Carruth is shot four times and left for dead in her car. Charlotte North Carolina Investigators suspect Carruth, but soon learn that this murder is not what it seems. They discover that they are dealing with a cold and remorseless killer where every murder has its price. Convicted killer Van Brett Watkins reveals the sordid details of the only "hit" he regrets doing.

name: The Killer Speaks
overview: Real convicted killers face the camera and describe their crimes in full detail.

episodes.name: Ice Cold: Levi King
episodes.overview: Levi King kills two Missouri residents in 2005, then travels to the Texas Panhandle to continue his murderous ways.

episodes.name: Mad Maks: Maksim Gelman
episodes.overview: Maksim Gelman discusses the four murders he committed in New York City in 2011.

episodes.name: Monster Inside: Robert Lopez
episodes.overview: A "push-button killer" who served time for stabbing a woman unleashes his hidden rage on a new girlfriend.

episodes.name: Twisted Love: Dena Riley
episodes.overview: A woman and her boyfriend, a convicted rapist, unleash their violent sexual fantasies upon two innocent victims.

episodes.name: Payback: Earl Forrest
episodes.overview: A Missouri man kills two people at a friend's home, then continues the bloodshed when authorities come looking for him.

episodes.name: Gene Meredith: Devil Inside
episodes.overview: Detectives in Great Falls, Mont., investigate the grisly stabbing death of a former corrections officer; the killer reveals his thoughts behind the crime.

episodes.name: Gene Meredith: Devil Inside
episodes.overview: The Killer Speaks examines the 2006 murders of former corrections officer Rose Torres in Great Falls, Montana. Police arrest and later convict Gene Meredith for the murders. From prison, Meredith talks about his life and crimes. He claims that he is mentally ill and was driven to act by voices in his head.

episodes.name: Timothy Thomason: Perfect Murder
episodes.overview: In 1991, a human skull is found in the woods outside of San Antonio and a perfect murder begins to unravel. Investigators figure out the identity of their victim, but without witnesses or evidence, the case goes cold quickly. Until a career criminal in California makes a sudden and surprising confession, an admission that turns out to be less than truthful. Now, the killer describes what happened that night and why he confessed to the murder he could have gotten away with.

episodes.name: Lawrence Tarbert: Natural Born Killer
episodes.overview: In Alamogordo, New Mexico, a young man is shot in cold blood and left to die on a remote mountain trail. As detectives hunt for the murderer, they worry they may be dealing with a potential serial killer who could strike again at any time. Now, the killer describes in detail how he murdered his victim and delivers a shocking revelation about his past.

episodes.name: Gary Ray Bowles: The I-95 Killer
episodes.overview: In 1994, a mysterious drifter went on a violent killing spree leaving a trail of men, brutally killed. Investigators in three states soon realized that they were dealing with a serial killer, who never stayed in one place for long.

episodes.name: Van Brett Watkins: Hitman
episodes.overview: On November 15, 1999 the 24-year-old pregnant girlfriend of Carolina Panthers football player Rae Carruth is shot four times and left for dead in her car. Charlotte North Carolina Investigators suspect Carruth, but soon learn that this murder is not what it seems. They discover that they are dealing with a cold and remorseless killer where every murder has its price. Convicted killer Van Brett Watkins reveals the sordid details of the only "hit" he regrets doing.
